translations.Workflow settings JSON value cannot be p: Workflow settings JSON value cannot be parsed
translations.Server side OCR processing via workflow: Server side OCR processing via workflow engine
translations.This app makes it possible to process va:
This app makes it possible to process various files via OCR algorithms.
	The processing is done via workflow engine and can therefore easily be customized.
	Please note that you'll have to install the OcrMyPDF CLI on your Nextcloud server to process PDF files. More installation instructions can be found in the docs https://github.com/R0Wi/workflow_ocr/blob/master/README.md.
translations.The language(s) to be used for OCR proce: The language(s) to be used for OCR processing
translations.These tags will be assigned to the file: These tags will be assigned to the file after OCR processing has finished
translations.These tags will be removed from the file: These tags will be removed from the file after OCR processing has finished
translations.Apply this mode if file already has OCR: Apply this mode if file already has OCR content
